articles.title: Komodo Dragons’ Iron Teeth: A New Discovery in Reptilian Predation - The Daily Galaxy --Great Discoveries Channel
articles.description: A groundbreaking study has revealed that Komodo dragons, the largest living lizards, possess a unique adaptation in their teeth: a concentrated layer of iron.
articles.content:
